long_description: Fast-rolling 29er wheels, a 140mm-travel RockShox fork and a RaceFace 10x1 drivetrain make the Diamondback Mason Comp 29er mountain bike the weapon of choice for those tackling aggressive lines. 140mm-travel Rock Shock Sektor Gold fork includes a tapered steerer, magnesium lowers and a 15mm thru axle for precision; lockout and rebound offer easy adjustment. RaceFace Respond single-ringed crankset with MRP chain guide is paired with 10-speed, 11-36t cassette for good all-around gearing; ISCG 05 tabs make an upgrade easy. SRAM X5 shifter guides the SRAM X5 rear derailleur quickly and precisely through the 10 gears. 6061-T6 weapons-grade aluminum frame boasts an array of formed and butted-and-formed tubes along with a tapered head tube to deliver a strong, stiff and responsive ride. Slack 66.5deg head tube angle offers stable, confidence-inspiring handling on aggressive trails; 16.77 in. long chainstays make it easier to get the front up over obstacles. Avid Elixir 5 hydraulic disc brakes deliver responsive braking thanks to a 180mm rotor up front and 160mm rotor in the back. Diamondback AM290 rims spin smoothly around sealed cartridge bearing hubs and are wrapped with Kenda Nevegal 29 x 2.2 (front) and Slant 29 x 2 (rear) tires. Specs on the Diamondback Mason 29er hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Fast-rolling 29er wheels, a 140mm-travel RockShox fork and a RaceFace 10x1 drivetrain make the Diamondback Mason Comp 29er mountain bike the weapon of choice for those tackling aggressive lines.
